revisions.*: Because "rvslots" was not specified, a legacy format has been used for the output. This format is deprecated, and in the future the new format will always be used.

==Description==
The Monster of the Month Vendor sells hued wearables and [[Meta_Pets|Meta Pet]] dyes in exchange for [[Donation_Coin|Donation Coins]]. The vendor can be found just outside the West Britain Bank.

==Monster of the Month Merchandise==
The vendor sells various types of aesthetic clothing and [[Meta_Pets|Meta Pet]] dyes hued to match those dropped [[Monster_of_the_Month|Monster of the Month]] creatures.
